title: American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // Promo #11
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: The witches can easily free the spirits from the murder house. They did it with the Axeman in coven (they released his spirit from the house,remember?). This season'll be good.
Ryan Murphy is a GENIUS!!!! I love everything he does but in my opinion American Horror Story takes the cake♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️

THANK GOD U WENT BACK TO SEASON 1 AT THE END AND STARTED FROM THERE...I'VE BEEN WAITNG SINCE SEASON 1 FOR THIS TO HAPPEN. WHAT IS MORE INTERESTING THAN TATEZ ANTICHRIST CHILD AND CONSTANCE AS HIS GRANDMA. FINALLY. THANK U AHS....BOUT TIME ..OUR ...QUEEN..HAS...RETURNED...WE LOVE U JESSICA..
I think clearly with the bottle and the kid blowing out the candles in a cake that it's gonna be Tate's Antichrist son that will be part of the Apocalypse.
